entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' #77773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard" #77770
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Move the construction cost of SettingsEditorFactory to when it's used #77754
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unseal a method that TS has IVT to and overrides #77767
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' #77771
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix handling of partial definition deletes #77735
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread #77768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
